verses.verse: בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At the same time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him, will I be the God לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol of all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot of all the families יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah like יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yu- become לִ֥י li לְעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am. and they shall be my people ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD מָצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar, in the wilderness עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am The people שְׂרִ֣ידֵי <S%H8300><s%> se-Ri-dei [which were] left חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; of the sword הָל֥וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch when I went לְהַרְגִּיע֖וֹ <S%H7280><s%> le-har-gi-'O to cause him to rest יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. [even] Israel

מֵרָח֕וֹק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok of old יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD נִרְאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah hath appeared לִ֑י Li; וְאַהֲבַ֤ת <S%H160><s%> ve-'a-ha-Vat love עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam thee with an everlasting אֲהַבְתִּ֔יךְ <S%H157><s%> 'a-hav-Tich, unto me [saying] Yea I have loved עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that מְשַׁכְתִּ֥יךְ <S%H4900><s%> me-shach-Tich have I drawn חָֽסֶד׃ <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed. therefore with lovingkindness

ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od Again אֶבְנֵךְ֙ <S%H1129><s%> 'ev-neCh Again I will build וְֽנִבְנֵ֔ית <S%H1129><s%> ve-niv-Neit, thee and thou shalt be built בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lat O virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od Again תַּעְדִּ֣י <S%H5710><s%> ta'-Di thou shalt again be adorned תֻפַּ֔יִךְ <S%H8596><s%> tup-Pa-yich, with thy tabrets וְיָצָ֖את <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tzat and shalt go forth בִּמְח֥וֹל <S%H4234><s%> bim-Chol in the dances מְשַׂחֲקִֽים׃ <S%H7832><s%> me-sa-cha-Kim. of them that make merry

ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od Again תִּטְּעִ֣י <S%H5193><s%> tit-te-'I Thou shalt yet plant כְרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> che-ra-Mim, vines בְּהָרֵ֖י <S%H2022><s%> be-ha-Rei upon the mountains שֹֽׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron; of Samaria נָטְע֥וּ <S%H5193><s%> na-te-'U the planters נֹטְעִ֖ים <S%H5193><s%> no-te-'Im shall plant וְחִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> ve-chil-Le-lu. and shall eat [them] as common things

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- For there shall be י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, a day קָרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'U shall cry נֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> no-tze-Rim [that] the watchmen בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har upon the mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim ק֚וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Ku-mu Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-na-'a-Leh ye and let us go up צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, to Zion אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God פ Peh

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For כֹ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> choh thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD רָנּ֤וּ <S%H7442><s%> ran-Nu Sing לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko for Jacob שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah, with gladness וְצַהֲל֖וּ <S%H6670><s%> ve-tza-ha-Lu and shout בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh among the chief הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim; of the nations הַשְׁמִ֤יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> hash-Mi-'u publish הַֽלְלוּ֙ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu ye praise וְאִמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'im-Ru, ye and say הוֹשַׁ֤ע <S%H3467><s%> ho-Sha' save יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha, thy people אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold I will bring אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz country צָפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon, them from the north וְקִבַּצְתִּים֮ <S%H6908><s%> ve-kib-batz-Tim and gather מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <S%H3411><s%> mi-yar-ke-tei- them from the coasts אָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> 'a-Retz of the earth בָּ֚ם bam עִוֵּ֣ר <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver [and] with them the blind וּפִסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> u-fis-Se-ach, and the lame הָרָ֥ה <S%H2030><s%> ha-Rah the woman with child וְיֹלֶ֖דֶת <S%H3205><s%> ve-yo-Le-det and her that travaileth with child יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav; together קָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> ka-Hal company גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol a great יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shu-vu shall return הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah. here

בִּבְכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> biv-Chi with weeping יָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u, They shall come וּֽבְתַחֲנוּנִים֮ <S%H8469><s%> u-ve-ta-cha-nu-Nim and with supplications אֽוֹבִילֵם֒ <S%H2986><s%> oi-Lem will I lead אֽוֹלִיכֵם֙ <S%H1980><s%> o-li-Chem walk אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- by נַ֣חֲלֵי <S%H5158><s%> Na-cha-lei by the rivers מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, of waters בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech way יָשָׁ֔ר <S%H3477><s%> ya-Shar, in a straight לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo they will not יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> yik-ka-she-Lu wherein they shall not stumble בָּ֑הּ Bah; כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti I am לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El to Israel לְאָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> le-'Av, for I am a father וְאֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> ve-'ef-Ra-yim and Ephraim בְּכֹ֥רִי <S%H1060><s%> be-Cho-ri [is] my firstborn הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he ס sa-Mek

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, O ye nations וְהַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> ve-hag-Gi-du and declare בָאִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> va-'i-Yim [it] in the isles מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <S%H4801><s%> mi-mer-Chak; afar off וְאִמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'im-Ru, and say מְזָרֵ֤ה <S%H2219><s%> me-za-Reh He that scattered יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel יְקַבְּצֶ֔נּוּ <S%H6908><s%> ye-kab-be-Tzen-nu, will gather וּשְׁמָר֖וֹ <S%H8104><s%> u-she-ma-Ro him and keep כְּרֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> ke-ro-'Eh him as a shepherd עֶדְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5739><s%> ed-Ro. [doth] his flock

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for פָדָ֥ה <S%H6299><s%> fa-Dah hath redeemed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; Jacob וּגְאָל֕וֹ <S%H1350><s%> u-ge-'a-Lo and ransomed מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad him from the hand חָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> cha-Zak of [him that was] stronger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu. than

וּבָאוּ֮ <S%H935><s%> u-va-'U Therefore they shall come וְרִנְּנ֣וּ <S%H7442><s%> ve-rin-ne-Nu and sing בִמְרוֹם־ <S%H4791><s%> vim-rom- in the height צִיּוֹן֒ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-yOn of Zion וְנָהֲר֞וּ <S%H5102><s%> ve-na-ha-Ru and shall flow together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over ט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> tuv to the goodness יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and over דָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> da-Gan for wheat וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over תִּירֹ֣שׁ <S%H8492><s%> ti-Rosh and for wine וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over יִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> yitz-Har, and for oil וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- and for the young צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> u-va-Kar; and of the herd וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become נַפְשָׁם֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sham and their soul כְּגַ֣ן <S%H1588><s%> ke-Gan garden רָוֶ֔ה <S%H7302><s%> ra-Veh, shall be as a watered וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יוֹסִ֥יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> yo-Si-fu any more לְדַאֲבָ֖ה <S%H1669><s%> le-da-'a-Vah and they shall not sorrow עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. again

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then תִּשְׂמַ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> tis-Mach rejoice בְּתוּלָה֙ <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lah Then shall the virgin בְּמָח֔וֹל <S%H4234><s%> be-ma-Chol, in the dance וּבַחֻרִ֥ים <S%H970><s%> u-va-chu-Rim both young men וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> u-ze-ke-Nim and old יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav; together וְהָפַכְתִּ֨י <S%H2015><s%> ve-ha-fach-Ti for I will turn אֶבְלָ֤ם <S%H60><s%> 'ev-Lam their mourning לְשָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> le-sa-sOn into joy וְנִ֣חַמְתִּ֔ים <S%H5162><s%> ve-Ni-cham-Tim, and will comfort וְשִׂמַּחְתִּ֖ים <S%H8055><s%> ve-sim-mach-Tim them and make them rejoice מִיגוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H3015><s%> mi-go-Nam. from their sorrow

וְרִוֵּיתִ֛י <S%H7301><s%> ve-riv-vei-Ti And I will satiate נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh the soul הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests דָּ֑שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> Da-shen; with fatness וְעַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mi and my people אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with טוּבִ֥י <S%H2898><s%> tu-Vi with my goodness יִשְׂבָּ֖עוּ <S%H7646><s%> yis-Ba-'u shall be satisfied נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol A voice בְּרָמָ֤ה <S%H7414><s%> be-ra-Mah in Ramah נִשְׁמָע֙ <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma' was heard נְהִי֙ <S%H5092><s%> ne-Hi lamentation בְּכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> be-Chi weeping תַמְרוּרִ֔ים <S%H8563><s%> tam-ru-Rim, [and] bitter רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel Rahel מְבַכָּ֣ה <S%H1058><s%> me-vak-Kah weeping עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for בָּנֶ֑יהָ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-ha; for her children מֵאֲנָ֛ה <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nah refused לְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> le-hin-na-Chem to be comforted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for בָּנֶ֖יהָ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-ha for her children כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-nu. are no ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מִנְעִ֤י <S%H4513><s%> min-'I Refrain קוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H6963><s%> ko-leCh thy voice מִבֶּ֔כִי <S%H1065><s%> mib-Be-chi, from weeping וְעֵינַ֖יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Na-yich and thine eyes מִדִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> mid-dim-'Ah; from tears כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for יֵ֨שׁ <S%H3426><s%> yesh shall be שָׂכָ֤ר <S%H7939><s%> sa-Char rewarded לִפְעֻלָּתֵךְ֙ <S%H6468><s%> lif-'ul-la-teCh for thy work נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וְשָׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Sha-vu and they shall come again מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz from the land אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> o-Yev. of the enemy
